attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
McCoy's have made their crinkle-cut crisps "30% less sat fat".  Certain aficionados have noticed that this has significantly affected the flavour of the product, and therefore their enjoyment of said snack.

McCoy's are supposed to be "man crisps", therefore this "diet" version must be outlawed immediately, allowing for them to be returned to the original winning formula.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
False or incomplete name or address information
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
